alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Garfield; Holt; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 15 at 3:22AM CDT until March 16 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow with some mixed precipitation possible. Blowing snow likely. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Boyd, Holt, Garfield and Wheeler Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on very hazardous travel conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, including near whiteout conditions at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will likely be a quick-moving but relatively intense area of rain changing to snow, likely including a brief period of freezing rain and sleet. Even after falling snow ends, blowing and drifting snow may continue. In addition, temperatures fall below freezing throughout the event, which may make surfaces very slick.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
